name: Z
description: Z is a BEP-20 meme token on BNB Smart Chain that pairs entertainment value with a clear-cut financial design. The contract was deployed with a fixed 1 000 000 000 supply, zero transfer taxes, and ownership renounced; the rules cannot be modified. At launch, 100 % of trading liquidity was created against USD1—World Liberty Financial’s fiat-backed, BitGo-custodied stablecoin—and the LP tokens were burned. This structure gives the community a light-hearted brand (Zippy the zebra) while anchoring price discovery to a dollar-pegged asset, making Z suitable for low-friction trading, tipping and future on-chain payments.
